website_summaries.verdict: These shoes offer Red Wing's superior construction in a versatile style for a price that falls at the lower end of the brand's range. Hands down the best value on our shortlist.
pros: Men who want a comfortable pair of shoes for work, casual, or semi-dressy wear will be impressed by these shoes, as the classic oxford style and handsome, leather workmanship pairs perfectly with numerous fashions and occasions
cons: The fit runs quite large, and the shoes may stretch a bit with wear, causing the size to feel even larger over time
The pointed toes look nice, but may bother some men with various foot issues

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.  I want more.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are fantastic. They LOOK to be very high quality. Time will tell if they live up to the typical Red Wing longevity. I typically wear a 10M-10.5M. I got these shoes in 9.5M and they are perfect. The insoles are very comfortable (I am on my feet much of the day). The leather is surprisingly soft and comfortable from the beginning. I almost want to order a 2nd pair to hold on to in case Red Wing ever stops making these. I've given up on the crappy $80-$100 made in "insert developing country" fake leather with glued on sole shoes. These shoes breath so much better than most of my shoes because they are full grain natural leather.
customer_reviews.author: Matt1382

customer_reviews.title: Don't size down from your other Red Wings
customer_reviews.text: I listened to all the reviews and sized down one size from my typical shoe size of 9.5 however, they were way too small especially in the toe box. I have other Red Wings boots including the Heritage Moc Toe size 9 and Heritage Iron Rangers in 9.5 which is my typical shoe and boot size. From reading the reviews, it seemed like a no-brainer to opt for a smaller shoe but they were at least a size too big and I had to return. I think you should go get these particular shoes sized at a physical location as they don't feel the same as any other Red Wings I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: lucasf

customer_reviews.title: Well made and durable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my grandson who is going away to college. He wanted some heavy duty shoes that would have good support and since he is going to an area with a lot of rain he also wanted a shoe that would keep his feet dry. And these really fit the bill. The shoe is very well made and comfortable. You have the protection of a boot while still having comfort. Just remember that when they tell you they run big, they do. We had to exchange them for smaller size, but with Amazon’s return policy we had our exchange completed in less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: TRY SIZE FIRST AT A STORE
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews about how it runs large, therefore I decided to go to the nearest Red Wing store to try it. My usual shoe size for nikes is 9.5 US. At the store, the employee recommended me to try size 8 US and it fit perfectly with one thumb spacing at the toe. He said that by going up in size, it is mainly getting longer length wise. I suggest trying it in the store and then buying on amazon as the Red Wing store is selling it at original price of 200 usd +
customer_reviews.author: Gordon H.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes, good quality material, and sure to last a long time. Inside the shoe are arches that’s not obvious to the naked eye until worn. When worn, it’s initially stiff, then soften as you use it. I use my shoes with wool socks and it seems to fits well. It fits best with dress socks.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Angel

customer_reviews.title: Less than 6 months old and sole separating
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes, it took about 10 days before they got comfortable which is fine. The shoes now fit like a sock, perfect. What is not ok and the reason for 1 star is the sole separating on one shoe from midpoint of side of the shoe to the toe in less than 6 months. For a shoe that costs this much and from Redwing it really is not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: William COttrell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit! Great quality and style
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair due to the sizing being off. Normally I wear a 12 in Red Wing Chukka Work boots. The 12 in these was too big - returned and got the 11.5....still too big - finally got the 11’s. Perfect fit! Great quality and style. I also ordered the Red Wing Postman version but in size 12 (it actually is true to size). Liked these better as they are more ‘relaxed’ looking. The construction is solid and they are just what I was looking for. Just make sure you order 1 size smaller and all should be good.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen K

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable once they break in ( approx 1 week)
customer_reviews.text: These are nice looking shoes and very comfortable once they break in. The best part is they are made in the USA! They certainly aren't the least expensive shoes you'll ever purchase but I'll always support American badly spend more money to support American businesses.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Lauricella

customer_reviews.title: Quality Shoe
customer_reviews.text: After ordering two pairs and sizing down each time the third pair fit beautifully. Interestingly enough the 1st and 3rd of the three pairs had steel eyelets while the 2nd pair didn't. I purchased the Red Wing Mink Oil paste and worked it into the shoes to protect the leather and was pleased with the darker tint it left. They've been a great everyday wear shoe. Glad to support Minnesota workers.
customer_reviews.author: Ky

customer_reviews.title: One size down. Comfortable after breaking in.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes. I wear size 11 for sneakers and size 10 is the best fit for me for this pair of shoes. I have wide feet but they feel comfortable in these so I'd say they have a nice spacious toe room. It does require some breaking in. Back of my heels were in quite the pain the first few times I wore them(a small piece of skin on my right foot actually chaffed off the second time I wore these). However after I broken in these they are really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: harryhao

customer_reviews.title: red wing is heading to a bad path
customer_reviews.text: the toe box area lining is synthetic fabric which ruins the breathablity that red shoes should be proud of.
customer_reviews.author: lao wang

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, heed the warning
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, heed the warning. I purchased a half size down to an 8.5 from a 9/9.5 normal and they were far too large to even consider wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Peehler

customer_reviews.title: Buy half size down
customer_reviews.text: Usually wear 10.5 but the first pair i bought were too large. I refunded them and bought size 10s, fit perfectly. Shoes are comfortable to walk in all day, the leather is thick and fit so well i dont have to tie my laces for them to stay on. Honestly surprised at the quality of these things.
customer_reviews.author: Karol Polaczek

customer_reviews.title: Order smaller than your normal size and it will fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe. Perfect for wearing to work on the weekend. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Lorne Dauterman

customer_reviews.title: All around great, if it fits
customer_reviews.text: So I'll say this, if you get the right size, these things are amazing. I, unfortunately have tried both a 12 and a 13 and my feet are just in the middle. Too wide for a 12 but too short for a 13. I have only nice things to say about this shoe. But as a matter of marketing, I would say a 12.5 size is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O'Grady

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Really like the Muleskinner very subtle leather and like the color.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Ameer Muhammad

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoes, they do run a bit large.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoes. They run large, I normally wear size 10.5 in Nike sneakers, 9.5 in Clarks, 10 in adidas and 9.5 in other Red Wing boots. I had to buy size 9 on this shoes and there is plenty of room for my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Getting unglued!!
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping for a quality shoe. The sole has already started to come off. Will take to RedWings store and see if they will glue back. Very disappointed in this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: E. Drumheller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes! Quality is second to none and these ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes! Quality is second to none and these will last a lifetime. A little on the pricey side but these will easily last 4 times as long as Chinese Timberlands.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hupp

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely comfy
customer_reviews.text: The Weekender is a well-made shoe. Having it in muleskinner makes this pair stylish. It takes a bit of time to break-in. Buy half a size down.
customer_reviews.author: jlconferido

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, durable and a RED WING’
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for; a reliable good looking pair of shoes to help me put up the finishing touches on my casual work attire! Comfortable, durable and best of all, RED WING!
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Diaz

customer_reviews.title: and fit great! Very comfortable and they look great
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews, and ordered 1/2 size smaller than I usually wear (10 1/2). They arrived in 2 days, and fit great! Very comfortable and they look great. Unlined, if that makes any difference to you - does not matter to me though.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, but definitely order 1/2 size smaller than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, nice looking shoe. Copper rough/tough color is definitely the way to go. It fits about 1 size large. I'm usually a 11-11.5 and comfortably wear a 10.5 in this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Gates

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! My best fit is 10 - 10-1/2. EE in casual/dress shoes. I bought 10-1/2 and they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: GARY BROWN

customer_reviews.title: I have another pair of heritage classics in a 11 ...
customer_reviews.text: I have another pair of heritage classics in a 11.5, but the 11.5 I got are just a tad large.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes. Very comfortable. Sure to get you lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Gattis

customer_reviews.title: Fit was great and the recipient loved them
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were a gift. Fit was great and the recipient loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far, these are breaking in well. Comfortable and durable. What else could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Rasheed Refaey

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, I ordered a half size smaller than ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, I ordered a half size smaller than usual and the fit perfectly. They were a little scuffed from shipping but this buffed out.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Clements

customer_reviews.title: He said they are the most comfortable shoes he's ever worn
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loves them! He said they are the most comfortable shoes he's ever worn! True to size and excellent workmanship, they should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Knowing Red Wings run 1 size large - they fit as expected; just buy 1 size smaller than you wear usually. I was disappointed with insoles - they are not lined with leather - just leather like fabric. For this reason I had to return them. It was almost an insult - if you going to use fabric lined insole >> make them look like fabric. The shoe is well built but because the insoles are cheap I am giving only 2 stars - considering the price. I was also concerned of the rubber soles - the material looks like it would wear quickly.
customer_reviews.author: LubosD

customer_reviews.title: But if I would of went down a size like other suggest they would not fit
customer_reviews.text: My feet are a little wide not that wide that I buy wide shoes but enough to effect fit in some shoes. These does are a little wider than other shoes but are also a little longer. But if I would of went down a size like other suggest they would not fit. So if you have wider feet your normal shoe size will probably work for you. The shoes are very comfortable and look good.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B

customer_reviews.title: Red wings are a great footwear, i recommend sizing 1 half size down
customer_reviews.text: Red wings are a great footwear, i recommend sizing 1 half size down. i wear a 10 normally, ordered a 9.5 and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When the shoes came I was very disappointed with them
customer_reviews.text: usually I wear size 10 M, and Ive ordered size 10 M. When the shoes came I was very disappointed with them. They were to long and very narrow on the front. They seemed two sizes larger except, made very narrow on the front. The whole front of the shoe is looking strange, like the maker did not have enough material there. I could use it but, did not like the idea to have extra two inches of '' unused" shoe in front of my toes. Maybe its a fashionable design and I'm an old fashion person. Any way Ive returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Lyudmyla

customer_reviews.title: The sizing with this shoe has been tough. They ...
customer_reviews.text: The sizing with this shoe has been tough. They seem to run really large. Usally wear a size 10 Nike or size 10 snowboard boot. Most sport shoes are 9.5 or 10s. My Red Wing 1907 Moc boot is a size 9 and the 9 in this shoe is way to big. Going to be either a 8.5 or even a 8.
customer_reviews.author: Devin C.

product_meta.title: Red Wing Heritage Men's Weekender Oxford Work Shoe
product_meta.description:
The new weekender collection is a flexible and lightweight alternative to the traditional good year welt, while still featuring our comfort force footbed and leathers from S.B. Foot tanning company. Care instruction-Use warm water and a soft bristle brush to remove stuck-on dirt. Then use a clean, dry cloth to wipe away any remaining excess dirt

Weekender Collection is a flexible and lightweight alternative that gives you the well deserved comfort you need for the weekend. The Red Wing approved, strong stitched down construction, is a tried and tested way of making durable footwear and one we have been using in our factory for a long time. To make the comfort complete The Weekender Collection features a ComfortForce footbed and leathers from S.B. Foot Tanning Company. As well as the traditional Red Wing quality and craftsmanship inspired by our tried-and-true oxford and chukka silhouettes.
feature_bullets: Atlas tred sole,buy Red Wing Heritage footwear 1/2 size smaller than their normal size
